subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Sports Medicine
Soccer
Knees
lead_paragraph: A glut of games, especially in England’s rough-and-tumble Premier League, has caused injury problems that will rob the World Cup of some of its star power.
snippet: A glut of games, especially in England’s rough-and-tumble Premier League, has caused injury problems that will rob the World Cup of some of its star power.
